scenes.background: (Monica) taps her pen on the table, looking at you expectantly. (Bob) sighs and shakes his head.
scenes.description: ‘Alright, we’ve regrouped. What’s our next step?’

options.text: We should identify the key priorities and allocate resources accordingly.
options.analysis: You took a strategic approach, showing good perception and empathy, but self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I think it’s best if we delegate the less critical tasks and focus on the urgent ones.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution while emphasizing efficiency, showing strong self-regulation but less empathy.

options.text: Why not handle this yourselves? It’s part of your job description.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, potentially affecting team dynamics.
